name.ja: <ruby>闇<rt>やみ</rt></ruby>に<ruby>堕<rt>お</rt></ruby>ちた<ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>使<rt>し</rt></ruby>

text.en:
(This card is always treated as a "Darklord" card.)
Send 1 Fairy monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Darklord" monster from your hand, Deck, or banishment, ignoring its Summoning conditions. You can only activate 1 "Fallen Angel in Darkness" per turn.
